<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Brawling Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=438) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 160 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand. You gain access to the critical specialization effects of unarmed strikes in the brawling group and weapons in the brawling group. If you have [Monastic Weaponry](/Feats.aspx?ID=434), you also gain the critical specialization effects of all monk weapons in which you are trained.
name: Brawling Focus
